file_content.text: Hutt Cartel happy. No more beasts to gobble up my friends. Now just need spice.
You find beasts and their breeders? What happened?
Good! Everyone else I sent died. You are strong. Very strong.
Here is a gift from the Hutt Cartel. I will tell them the good news. Maybe they give me spice?
You kill beasts and Republic breeders. I wait here. Look for spice.
Sith is powerful. Sith has many treasures. Maybe spice? If you have, we trade for Republic secret.
You have spice, Imperial? You give, I tell Republic secret.
Mercenary travels galaxy. Maybe has spice? Give to me, and I trade Republic secret.
I smell spice. Do you have? Give, and I trade Republic secret.
Tell me what you know, or spice will be the least of your worries.
Don't dare bargain with me.
All right. I tell secret. Maybe spice later.
Tell me everything you know, then we'll discuss payment.
[Lie] Talk now, spice later.
Imperial is trustworthy. You'll like our secret.
Identify yourself.
I am Glort. Hutt Cartel pays me spice to bash people. One told me something special.
You reek. Leave me.
Don't be angry! I show friendship and tell you secret, even without spice.
I hear that Republic experiments on hungry creatures. Big monsters, armored hides, giant fangs.
Republic is putting machines in the beasts. Electrical re--repulses? Something to control them.
The Republic will need more than domesticated monsters to control Nar Shaddaa.
Beasts won't help them.
Even if right, beasts must be stopped.
A tamed rancor could tear its master's enemies to pieces.
What a brilliant idea.
Maybe they get hungry and tears its master to pieces, too.
The Republic must be in bad shape if they're resorting to such risky, criminal experiments.
A desperate move.
Yes. They do anything to hurt us.
With a pet like that, I'd barely have to draw my blaster.
I'd kill for my own beast.
Beasts maybe step on mercenary. Dangerous. Very dangerous.
Is this some stupid joke?
I don't lie! Cartel checked secret. Secret is true.
Creatures don't scare me.
Good. Nar Shaddaa is full of tough ones, but you are strongest.
Republic plans bad for Empire--and Hutt business. Hutts offer pay and friendship to kill beasts and their breeders... and maybe bring me spice?
I'll stop these things.
Good! Kill the beasts and their breeders. Make Hutt Cartel and Empire happy.
Maybe I'll deal with the rancors, but you're not getting any spice from me.
Enough with the spice talk.
I only wanted some as bonus. Hutts said okay to ask. Still need beasts dead, though.
You kill monsters and their breeders, but be careful. Republic controls the beasts now.
No deal. [Refuse quest]
Bad news. The Hutts won't like.
Running low on spice. Need more soon.
They'll rip us apart.
Enough about the spice!
